pages.text: When aspects break, they need to recharge before they can activate again. This process happens sequentially from left to right and is visualized by a $(thing)golden outline$() on your health bar. This outline covers all hearts with an aspect on them and is shown as long as $(o)any$() aspect is not fully recharged.

While designing your aspect setup, it is important to keep in mind that a recharging aspect will $(l)completely$() block all the ones after it from recharging, so you probably shouldn't stuff a really slow one far down your health bar.$(p)The recharge duration of each aspect is show in its $(thing)tooltip$().$(p)If you feel your aspects recharge too slowly, a $(thing)Potion of Resurgence$() may be of interest.
